algorithm_technique: Simulating file reading with a helper function and iterative buffer management
problem_summary_simple: Read 'n' characters from a file using a 'read4' API that reads 4 characters at a time.
problem_summary_technical: Simulates file reading by repeatedly calling read4, managing an internal buffer and tracking read characters to fulfill the 'n' character request.
key_insights: The core challenge is handling partial reads from read4 and ensuring exactly 'n' characters are returned.
A temporary buffer of size 4 is needed to store results from read4.
The loop iterates to read chunks of up to 4 characters, taking the minimum of remaining characters needed and characters available from read4.
